data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
My search of existing modules didn't turn up anything similar, so I
    assume this is new territory for Perl. There are many non-Perl
    partial solutions to the problem: vgrind, lgrind, listings.sty,
    enscript, a2ps ... but each of them is in some way too special
    purpose and imposes restrictions I can't live with.

    LaTeX is an existing top-level namespace, and Grind should be very
    descriptive for people who come looking for this sort of thing.
